content: this beautiful effortless 12 inch square is a great addition to any blanket/afghan it is quick to work up and is a great introduction to post stitches this pattern is block #15 of the 2024 moogly cal **materials ** * approximately 136 yds of category 4 medium weight yarn in 3 colors i used caron one pound yarn in the soft sage white and soft gray colorways * size j 6mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors * blocking board or mat * t pins
